Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Acid Shield Augment^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Perhaps one day I might call on your talents to help me with a little problem I am having...I'll need to consider.

You're probably starting to have some issues surviving by now in different biomes. So let's get you building ^orange;augments^reset;! Show me an ^orange;Acid Shield augment^reset;  made by your own two hands!
